user_reviews.review_text: The Alchemy Bar on Carnival Celebration was the highlight of our cruise! The mixologists are true artists and the Cucumber Sunrise was incredible.
The Lime & Coconut on Utopia of the Seas has the best pool deck atmosphere! Great music, friendly bartenders, and that signature cocktail is worth every penny.
Sugarcane Mojito Bar on Norwegian Prima offers the best mojitos at sea! The Waterfront location makes for a perfect sunset drink spot.
